connected_entities: Berlin Tunnel (1954-1956): Major signals intelligence operation
Richard Bissell: CIA Deputy Director, ZR/RIFLE program creator, Harvey's superior
ZR/RIFLE: CIA assassination program, Harvey was chief
Johnny Roselli: Chicago mob figure recruited for Castro assassination
Sam Giancana: Chicago mob boss involved in CIA-mafia plots
Task Force W: Anti-Castro operations, Harvey chief 1961-1963
Fidel Castro: Target of multiple CIA-mafia assassination attempts
Richard Helms: CIA officer who protected Harvey's career
John F. Kennedy: President whose administration conflicted with Harvey operations
Robert Kennedy: Attorney General who clashed with Harvey over Cuban operations
Cuban exiles: Harvey coordinated anti-Castro operations
Church Committee (1975): Investigated assassination programs after Harvey's death
Allen Dulles: CIA Director during Berlin Tunnel and early assassination plotting
network_type: CIA operational officer connecting assassination programs, organized crime, and anti-Castro operations
